text: Map showing the Atbara basin, with the Obel River (right) The Obel River is one of the main tributaries of the Mareb (Gash) river. The latter watercourse forms part of the border between Eritrea and Ethiopia, with its headwaters in the Eritrean Highlands. ==See also== *List of rivers of Eritrea ==References== Category:Rivers of Eritrea Category:Rivers of Ethiopia Category:International rivers of Africa Category:Eritrea–Ethiopia border Category:Border rivers
title: Obel River
